title: How to start to learn about tech anything - Quora

response.answer_text: Find something you're interested in, and go for it. Get a project idea in your head, something not too tough, and choose a programming language, and try your hardest to create a working program for that project. Research and learn as you go, piece by piece. Say you're creating a program that let's you add and remove to-dos. How will you store this data? Research the different data types of the programming language you chose. You settle on an list. How will you add to this list? How will you remove from this list? How can you pull specific data out of this list? Bit by bit you will start to understand how to program, but it won't be easy. It will, however, feel amazing when you have a working program. The idea of creating something from nothing, it's addicting.

You can always start with some of the trending websites that give the technology concerned news updates like Gizmodo , TechCrunch etc. If you would like creating and developing programs , softwares and applications , basic coding skill is required . There are several free online sites that provide online tutorials .
